cards.name: Your city!
cards.description: Report 3 safety concerns (potholes, broken traffic lights, etc) to 311. You must report each concern in separate calls. Alternatively, remove 10 pieces of litter from  a park. The litter does not all have to be from the same park.

cards.name: Blackout
cards.description: Neither teammate may use a phone to research public transit routes for the remainder of the game. This card cannot be vetoed.
